text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: El Derby Japonés está sobre nosotros.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
This is our chance to show the<n>spectators, the
younger students, and<n>my future rivals the beauty
of our dream.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If I'm to realize my ideals, then this is<n>one race I
cannot afford to lose.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: La victoria es la única opción.
choice_data_list: Solo trata de mantener la cabeza clara.
Solo trata de mantener la cabeza clara.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haha. I'm an open book to you, aren't I?<n>You're
right, of course—I am getting a<n>little swept up in
the spirit of the race.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But how else would you have me feel?<n>The crowd
expects the best from me...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You aspire to the title of Derby Trainer,<n>don't
you? As surely every trainer must.
choice_data_list: Todo lo que quiero es verte coronada.
Todo lo que quiero es verte coronada.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
So if I simply race to realize my own<n>ambitions,
then yours will come about<n>naturally.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Well, you need do nothing more than sit<n>back
and watch. The stands are packed<n>with fans who
have come to watch<n>dreams take flight.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Deja que el Emperador les dé uno para aplaudir.
